original_title: An Adventure of a Tiny Man and Gulliver
overview: Distinctive Avant Garde Comedy that combines three very interesting, mysterious and adventurous novels. Film undermines, subversing, questioning and challenging generally recognised norms, mainstreams, moral standards of today's reality. Grandmaster wins his life. What happens when the devil decides to do good deeds for others ‘during its career’? Two celebrities surprisingly look like Statham. This striking resemblance leaves one of the celebrities quite tired out.
title: An Adventure of a Tiny Man and Gulliver
